events.message: The customer submitted an auto accident claim due to a rear-end collision that occurred on May 14th.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the accident details and involved vehicle type.
An experienced claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the customer's vehicle collision case.
The customer received official acknowledgment of their auto accident claim submission by our claims department.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates from the customer for claim processing.
Customer successfully submitted all requested documents including accident reports and repair bills.
Investigation team began reviewing the collision circumstances and verifying all submitted evidence for accuracy.
Investigation concluded confirming the extent of damage and liability in the auto accident claim.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the damage assessment and policy coverage.
The customer provided positive feedback regarding the clarity of the settlement offer and support from the agent.
Claim approval was granted following agreement on the proposed settlement and necessary validations.
The insurance payment was successfully issued to the customer for the vehicle repair coverage.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation from the customer.
